title: Building a Restaurant Reservation App with a Galaxy Theme
excerpt: I share my journey of creating the Delix Restaurant app — a futuristic reservation platform with a galaxy-inspired design using React and Firebase.
content: The Delix project was inspired by a desire to merge the futuristic galaxy aesthetic with functional app design. I started by sketching moodboards in Figma and then brought it to life in React. Firebase handled authentication and real-time reservations. The biggest challenge was performance optimization, especially with background animations, which I solved with lazy loading and compression. This project helped me master UI consistency and modern front-end principles.

title: How I Optimized KU Hub for Kenyatta University Students
excerpt: A breakdown of how I built and optimized KU Hub — a student portal focused on performance, accessibility, and user-centered design.
content: KU Hub was built using Django for the backend and Firebase for student data synchronization. My main goal was to reduce page load times, so I implemented query caching and used React for a smoother front-end experience. The result was a 40% performance boost and higher engagement among students. I also focused on dark-mode UI for visual comfort.

title: Tips for Creating Stunning Email Templates
excerpt: My top tips for designing emails that are both functional and visually appealing, with responsiveness and engagement in mind.
content: Email design is often overlooked, yet it’s a crucial touchpoint for user engagement. In this article, I go over spacing, typography, and responsive layouts. I use MJML and inline CSS for compatibility across clients. One key takeaway is the importance of testing — each email should render consistently on Outlook, Gmail, and mobile devices.
